cleaned_text: To ensure our facilities are safe places, face coverings must be worn at all times. Learn more about [clinic and hospital visits](/content/vmfhorg/en/patient-and-visitor-information.html). Virginia Mason was founded on the idea that when doctors get together and collaborate, they can serve patients better. Most medical centers are made up of many separate practices — with separate information systems, quality standards and philosophies of care. At Virginia Mason, 6,000 staff members — including more than 400 physicians — work together every day as part of a single, highly skilled and specialized team. Patient forms
